001package org.nasdanika.common;
002
003import java.io.PrintStream;
004import java.util.List;
005
006public interface Diagnostic {
007        
008        Status getStatus();
009        
010        String getMessage();
011        
012        List<Object> getData();
013        
014        List<Diagnostic> getChildren();
015        
016        /**
017         * Throws {@link DiagnosticException} if status is {@link Status}.ERROR
018         * @param message
019         */
020        default void checkError(String message) {
021                if (getStatus() == Status.ERROR) {
022                        throw new DiagnosticException(message, this);
023                }
024        }
025        
026        static Diagnostic compose(String message, Diagnostic... diagnostics) {
027                if (diagnostics.length == 1 && diagnostics[0] != null) {
028                        return diagnostics[0];
029                }
030                
031                BasicDiagnostic ret = new BasicDiagnostic(Status.INFO, message);
032                for (Diagnostic diagnostic: diagnostics) {
033                        ret.add(diagnostic);
034                }
035                return ret;
036        }
037        
038        default void dump(PrintStream out, int indent, Status... statuses) {
039                for (int i=0; i < indent; ++i) {
040                        out.print("    ");
041                }
042                                
043                Status status = getStatus();
044                boolean match = statuses.length == 0;
045                for (Status s: statuses) {
046                        if (s == status) {
047                                match = true;
048                                break;
049                        }
050                }
051                if (match) {
052                        if (status != null) {
053                                // TODO - ANSI coloring of statuses
054                                out.print(status.name());
055                                out.print(' ');
056                        }
057        
058                        out.print(getMessage());
059        
060                        List<Object> data = getData();
061                        if (data != null) {
062                                out.print(" data=");
063                                out.print(getData());
064                                for (Object de: data) {
065                                        if (de instanceof Throwable) {
066                                                ((Throwable) de).printStackTrace(out);
067                                        }
068                                }
069                        }               
070                        
071                        out.println();
072                        
073                    List<Diagnostic> children = getChildren();
074                        if (children != null) {
075                        children.forEach(c -> c.dump(out, indent + 1, statuses));
076                    }
077                }               
078        }
079        
080}
